contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox Album <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = X Singles | Type = Compilation | Artist = [[X Japan]] | Cover = Xsingles.jpeg | Released = November 21, 1993 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Heavy metal (music)|Heavy metal]], [[power metal]], [[speed metal]], [[symphonic metal]], [[glam metal]] | Length = 77:34 | Label = [[Ki/oon Records|Ki/oon]] | Producer = | Reviews = | Chronology = [[X Japan]] compilation | Last album = | This album = ''X Singles''<br />(1993) | Next album = ''[[B.O.X ~Best of X~]]''<br />(1996) }} '''''X Singles''''' is a [[compilation album]] released by [[X Japan]] on November 21, 1993. It collects all the singles, and their B-sides, released by the band while still named "X" and under contract with [[Sony Records|CBS/Sony]]. The album reached number 2 on the [[Oricon]] chart, and charted for 35 weeks.<ref name="Oricon"> {{cite web | url = http://www.oricon.co.jp/prof/artist/26180/ranking/cd_album/ | title = X JAPANのアルバム売り上げランキング | work = oricon.co.jp | publisher = [[Oricon]] | accessdate = April 27, 2011}}</ref> In 1994, with 427,860 copies sold, it was the 36th best-selling album of the year. It was later certified Million by the [[Recording Industry Association of Japan|RIAJ]].<ref name="RIAJ">{{cite web | url = http://www18.ocn.ne.jp/~hbr/jp1mal_e.htm | title = RIAJ CERTIFIED MILLION SELLER ALBUMS | publisher = ocn.ne.jp | accessdate = 2012-12-04}}</ref> == Track listing == # "[[Kurenai (song)|Kurenai]]" # "[[20th Century Boy]]" <small>(Live) ([[T.
